subject: p15131736
History: With altered mental status. , eval for infectious process.
Findings: AP portable upright view of the chest. A left upper extremity PICC line is seen extending into the distal left brachiocephalic vein. Lung volumes are markedly low. The heart is stably enlarged. There is no overt evidence for pneumonia or CHF. No large effusion or pneumothorax is seen. Bony structures appear grossly intact.
Impression: Limited, negative. Left upper extremity PICC line terminates in the distal left brachiocephalic vein.
